Title: The Cure
Description:
Every day, millions confide in AI, exposing their most intimate problems and hoping it will fix them.
This is the story of two people—and their bots—on the very edge of therapy’s new frontier.

Title: AI’s Next Frontier? An Algorithm for Consciousness
Description:
Some of the world’s most interesting thinkers about thinking think they might’ve cracked machine sentience.
And I think they might be onto something.

Title: King to attend first official LGBT event after veterans' campaign
Description: A memorial is unveiled dedicated to gay military personnel and to those who served during the armed forces gay ban.

Title: In Russia's 'blitz' of Ukraine, the question of appeasement is back
Description: A large gulf remains between the US and European view of how to end the Ukraine war.

Title: Milei triumphs in Argentine midterm elections closely watched by Washington
Description:
President Milei won in key districts in an election widely seen as a referendum on his past two years in office.
Trump had appeared to condition billions of dollars in backing on a good showing for Milei.

Title: The 'Glucose Goddess' says 3 small diet tweaks revitalized her mood and energy. Here's how to use them wisely.
Description:
The "Glucose Goddess" built a brand around her blood sugar balancing hacks.
She said a few simple swaps to her diet boosted her mood, energy, and health.

Title: The optimistic millennials' guide to Gen Z's career apocalypse
Description:
I'm a millennial who graduated during the financial crisis.
Here's what Gen Z should know about a tough job market.

Title: Who is Susan Lorincz? Florida woman is focus of Netflix’s ‘Perfect Neighbor’
Description: A new Netflix documentary showcases a timeline of the neighbors' feud, resulting in the fatal shooting of Ajike "AJ" Shantrell Owens in 2023.

Title: The absurd American Paradox— You still pay, even when they don’t work | PERRY O. HOOPER JR.
Description: Only in Washington can the government shut down and still send you a tax bill.

Title: IU alumni pull $1M-plus in donations amid fight over control of student newspaper
Description: Some Indiana University graduates are finding other ways to support the Indiana Daily Student after Media School's actions.

Title: Week 8 winners and losers: Taylor and Cook deliver; CMC and Robinson fall flat
Description: Jonathan Taylor, James Cook III and Saquon Barkley led the way with big Week 8 performances, while Christian McCaffrey, Bijan Robinson and Caleb Williams were among the biggest disappointments.

Title: Letters from Our Readers
Description: Readers respond to Dana Goodyear’s piece about losing her home to the California wildfires.

Title: A coronation not a contest - Tanzania's first female president faces little opposition
Description: President Samia Suluhu Hassan faces no real competition at the polls amid a climate of self-censorship and fear.

Title: We're in the Wrong Moment
Description: Comments

Title: How I turned Zig into my favorite language to write network programs in
Description:
I’ve been watching the Zig language for a while now, given that it was created for writing audio software (low-level, no allocations, real time).
I never paid too much attention though, it seemed a little weird to me and I didn’t see the real need.
Then I saw…

Title: How Archaeology Is Reviving the Smell of History
Description: How can reconstructing long-lost smells of ancient artifacts help us connect with the past?

Title: Why Hurricane Melissa Could Be the Worst Storm to Ever Hit Jamaica
Description: Category 5 Hurricane Melissa’s exceptional strength and slow pace could make it more destructive than Hurricane Gilbert, which hit Jamaica in 1988

Title: Mosquitoes Found in Iceland for the First Time amid Climate Change
Description: Bird flu surges and a government shutdown collide, complicating efforts to track cases and protect flocks.

Title: Factors to Consider in Picking a School For Your Child
Description:
I’m an education researcher and a parent.
Here are some factors to consider in picking the best possible school for your child

Title: America's USS John C. Stennis Aircraft Carrier Will Be Out Of Service For Years - Here's Why
Description:
Aircraft carriers are the backbone of America's naval presence, yet one of its ships hasn't been in service since 2021.
There's a good reason for that...
